name:
Skylanders SuperChargers
Racing
description: Skylanders, start your engines! The infamous race promoter Pandergast has challenged the best racers in Skylands to come forward and test their driving skills in a head-to-head, no-holds-barred driving competition! Race across Land, Sea, and Sky for the ultimate prize - a mysterious token of immense power! Kick start your Skylanders adventure into overdrive with SkylandersÂ® SuperChargers Racing.
